page_title: God is Spirit - Not Physical Form - Biblical Foundation - Eyes of Azrael

internal.text: The Monad - The Unknowable SpiritExplore Gnostic theology's understanding of God as pure Spirit—the ineffable, unknowable, invisible One beyond all images and conceptions.
The Kingdom Within"The kingdom of God is within you" (Luke 17:21)—internal spiritual reality, not external physical religion.
Christ Reveals the Invisible GodHow Christ reveals God's spiritual nature—not through physical appearance but through spiritual truth and love.
The Demiurge - The False Physical GodUnderstanding how the creator-god of material religion differs from the true spiritual God revealed by Christ.
God's Infinite LoveGod is Spirit—and God is Love. The spiritual nature of divine love that transcends all physical religion.
Pure in Heart Shall See GodThe Beatitudes' promise of spiritual vision—seeing the invisible God with the pure heart's eye.
